p: Kim et al. published a case report of four patients who developed neurological manifestations during treatment of MERS. A triple antiviral treatment, consisting of subcutaneous pegylated interferon alpha-2a, high-dose oral ribavirin and oral lopinavir/ritonavir, was administered to all patients in the concerned hospital.
